class.name: com.navis.vessel.business.operation.VesselClass
class.meta: Reference entity representing the Vessel Class

property.name: vesclassId
property.meta: Vessel Class Id. Must be unique within Vessel classes

property.name: vesclassVesselType
property.meta: Basic class of this vessel class

property.name: vesclassIsActive
property.meta: Check whether the class is Active or not

property.name: vesclassIsSelfSustaining
property.meta: Check whether it is Self sustaining

many-to-one.name: vesclassBinModel
many-to-one.meta: The bin model that is associated with this Vessel Class.

property.name: vesId
property.meta: Vessel Id. Must be unique within vessels

property.name: vesIsActive
property.meta: Check whether it is active or not

property.name: vesUnitSystem
property.meta: Choice of units of measurement used on this ship (excluding temperature, controlled separately)

property.name: vesTemperatureUnits
property.meta: Choice of units for temperature used on this ship: Centigrade or Fahrenheit

property.name: vvdIsDrayOff
property.meta: check whether it is dray off or not

property.name: vvdIsNoClientAccess
property.meta: Check whether it has no client access or not

property.name: vvdIsCommonCarrier
property.meta: Check whether the visiting vessel is a common carrier or not

property.name: vvdTimePilotOnBoard
property.meta: Time when the pilot is on board

property.name: vvdTimePilotOffBoard
property.meta: Time during which the pilot is off board

component.name: vvdEstMoveCount
component.meta: Estimate the move counts of the vessel

class.name: com.navis.vessel.business.schedule.VesselStatisticsByCrane
class.meta: Reference entity representing the Crane Statistics details

many-to-one.name: cstatVvd
many-to-one.meta: Reference to the vessel visit details

class.name: com.navis.vessel.business.schedule.VesselStatisticsByLine
class.meta: Reference entity representing the Line Statistics details

many-to-one.name: lstatVvd
many-to-one.meta: Reference to the vessel visit details

class.name: com.navis.vessel.business.schedule.VesselStatisticsDelay
class.meta: Reference entity representing the Crane Delays details

many-to-one.name: cdelayCraneDelayType
many-to-one.meta: Reference to the crane delay type

many-to-one.name: vvlineVvd
many-to-one.meta: Vessel Identity of the vessel in the visit visitlines

class.name: com.navis.vessel.business.schedule.LateArrival
class.meta: Late arrivals for a Vessel Visit

many-to-one.name: vvlateVvd
many-to-one.meta: Vessel visit for which late arrival is expected

many-to-one.name: vvlateUfv
many-to-one.meta: Unit eventually received against late arrival entry

property.name: vvlateCutoff
property.meta: Late Arrival Cutoff Time (ATD if null)

class.name: com.navis.vessel.business.schedule.VesselVisitBerthing
class.meta: create index brthg_pos_anchor_idx on vsl_vessel_berthings(pos_anchor) INDEXTYPE IS MDSYS.SPATIAL_INDEX;
create spatial index brthg_pos_anchor_idx on vsl_vessel_berthings(pos_anchor) with ( bounding_box = ( 0, 0, 1000000, 1000000 ) );

property.name: brthgShipSideTo
property.meta: Berthing side-to (port side-to, or starboard side-to)

property.name: posLocType
property.meta: An Enum giving the type of position

property.name: posLocId
property.meta: A String giving the Id of the location: either a yard code, or carrier visit Id

property.name: posLocGkey
property.meta: The gkey of the Yard or CarrierVisit of this Position

property.name: posSlot
property.meta: A String giving the coordinates of the Position within its Location

property.name: posOrientation
property.meta: A String defining the orientation of the Unit within this Position

property.name: posName
property.meta: A String formatted for the user that represents the position

property.name: posOperationalPosId
property.meta: XPS operation position (TIP, TQ, LN.4, etc.)

many-to-one.name: posBin
many-to-one.meta: The bin to which this Position points to.

property.name: posTier
property.meta: An integer specifying the tier for this Position.

property.name: posAnchor
property.meta: xyz anchor point in bin's coordinate system.

property.name: posOrientationDegrees
property.meta: Orientation in degrees in bin's coordinate system.

class.name: com.navis.vessel.business.operation.LineLoadList
class.meta: Entity representing the Loadlist information as sent by Line Operator

property.meta: Effect of Load list - Add/Remove etc.

many-to-one.name: linellLineOperator
many-to-one.meta: Line Operator who sends the Load List

property.name: linellSenderId
property.meta: Id of Load list Sender - value from EDI

many-to-one.name: linellVesselVisit
many-to-one.meta: Vessel Visit for which the Loadlist pertains to

many-to-one.name: linellComplex
many-to-one.meta: The Complex to which Loadlist info. belongs.

class.name: com.navis.vessel.business.operation.LineDischargeList

many-to-one.name: linedlObVesselVisit

many-to-one.name: linedlComplex
many-to-one.meta: The Complex to which Discharge list info. belongs.
